info.description: Amplify is a fully managed continuous deployment and hosting service for modern web apps.
info.title: AWS Amplify

parameters.description: Pagination token. If non-null pagination token is returned in a result, then pass its value in another request to fetch more entries.
parameters.name: nextToken

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to list in a single response.
parameters.name: maxResults

accessToken.description: Personal Access token for 3rd party source control system for an Amplify App, used to create webhook and read-only deploy key. Token is not stored.

autoBranchCreationConfig.description: Structure with auto branch creation config.

autoBranchCreationPatterns.description: Automated branch creation glob patterns for the Amplify App.

basicAuthCredentials.description: Credentials for Basic Authorization for an Amplify App.

buildSpec.description: BuildSpec file for Amplify app build.

customRules.description: Custom rewrite / redirect rules for an Amplify App.

enableAutoBranchCreation.description: Enables automated branch creation for the Amplify App.

enableBasicAuth.description: Enable Basic Authorization for an Amplify App, this will apply to all branches part of this App.

enableBranchAutoBuild.description: Enable the auto building of branches for an Amplify App.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables map for an Amplify App.

iamServiceRoleArn.description: AWS IAM service role for an Amplify App

oauthToken.description: OAuth token for 3rd party source control system for an Amplify App, used to create webhook and read-only deploy key. OAuth token is not stored.

platform.description: Platform / framework for an Amplify App

delete.description: Delete an existing Amplify App by appId.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

get.description: Retrieves an existing Amplify App by appId.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

autoBranchCreationConfig.description: Structure with auto branch creation config.

autoBranchCreationPatterns.description: Automated branch creation glob patterns for the Amplify App.

basicAuthCredentials.description: Basic Authorization credentials for an Amplify App.

buildSpec.description: BuildSpec file for Amplify app build.

customRules.description: Custom redirect / rewrite rules for an Amplify App.

enableAutoBranchCreation.description: Enables automated branch creation for the Amplify App.

enableBasicAuth.description: Enables Basic Authorization for an Amplify App.

enableBranchAutoBuild.description: Enables branch auto-building for an Amplify App.

environmentVariables.description: Environment Variables for an Amplify App.

iamServiceRoleArn.description: IAM service role for an Amplify App.

get.description: Lists branches for an Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Pagination token. Set to null to start listing branches from start. If a non-null pagination token is returned in a result, then pass its value in here to list more branches.
parameters.name: nextToken

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to list in a single response.
parameters.name: maxResults

post.description: Creates a new Branch for an Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

basicAuthCredentials.description: Basic Authorization credentials for the branch.

buildSpec.description: BuildSpec file for Amplify app build.

displayName.description: Display name for a branch, will use as the default domain prefix.

enableAutoBuild.description: Enables auto building for the branch.

enableBasicAuth.description: Enables Basic Auth for the branch.

ttl.description: The content TTL for the website in seconds.

delete.description: Deletes a branch for an Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch.
parameters.name: branchName

get.description: Retrieves a branch for an Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch.
parameters.name: branchName

post.description: Updates a branch for an Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch.
parameters.name: branchName

basicAuthCredentials.description: Basic Authorization credentials for the branch.

buildSpec.description: BuildSpec file for Amplify app build.

displayName.description: Display name for a branch, will use as the default domain prefix.

enableAutoBuild.description: Enables auto building for the branch.

enableBasicAuth.description: Enables Basic Auth for the branch.

ttl.description: The content TTL for the website in seconds.

post.description: Create a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch, for the Job.
parameters.name: branchName

fileMap.description: Optional file map that contains file name as the key and file content md5 hash as the value. If this argument is provided, the service will generate different upload url per file. Otherwise, the service will only generate a single upload url for the zipped files.

post.description: Start a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch, for the Job.
parameters.name: branchName

jobId.description: The job id for this deployment, generated by create deployment request.

sourceUrl.description: The sourceUrl for this deployment, used when calling start deployment without create deployment. SourceUrl can be any HTTP GET url that is public accessible and downloads a single zip.

get.description: List Jobs for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for a branch.
parameters.name: branchName

parameters.description: Pagination token. Set to null to start listing steps from start. If a non-null pagination token is returned in a result, then pass its value in here to list more steps.
parameters.name: nextToken

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to list in a single response.
parameters.name: maxResults

post.description: Starts a new job for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch, for the Job.
parameters.name: branchName

commitId.description: Commit Id from 3rd party repository provider for the Job.

commitMessage.description: Commit message from 3rd party repository provider for the Job.

commitTime.description: Commit date / time for the Job.

jobId.description: Unique Id for an existing job. Required for "RETRY" JobType.

jobReason.description: Descriptive reason for starting this job.

jobType.description: Type for the Job. Available JobTypes are: \n "RELEASE": Start a new job with the latest change from the specified branch. Only available for apps that have connected to a repository. "RETRY": Retry an existing job. JobId is required for this type of job.

delete.description: Delete a job, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App.

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch, for the Job.
parameters.name: branchName

parameters.description: Unique Id for the Job.
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch, for the Job.
parameters.name: branchName

parameters.description: Unique Id for the Job.
parameters.name: jobId

delete.description: Stop a job that is in progress, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App.

parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Name for the branch, for the Job.
parameters.name: branchName

parameters.description: Unique Id for the Job.
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.description: Unique Id for an Amplify App.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: Pagination token. Set to null to start listing Apps from start. If non-null pagination token is returned in a result, then pass its value in here to list more projects.
parameters.name: nextToken

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to list in a single response.
parameters.name: maxResults

domainName.description: Domain name for the Domain Association.

App.description: Amplify App represents different branches of a repository for building, deploying, and hosting.

AutoBranchCreationConfig.description: Structure with auto branch creation config.

Branch.description: Branch for an Amplify App, which maps to a 3rd party repository branch.

BuildSpec.description: BuildSpec file for Amplify app build.

CreateBranchResult.description: Result structure for create branch request.

CreateDeploymentResult.description: Result structure for create a new deployment.

CreateDomainAssociationResult.description: Result structure for the create Domain Association request.

CreateWebhookRequest.description: Request structure for create webhook request.

CreateWebhookResult.description: Result structure for the create webhook request.

DeleteAppRequest.description: Request structure for an Amplify App delete request.

DeleteAppResult.description: Result structure for an Amplify App delete request.

DeleteBranchRequest.description: Request structure for delete branch request.

DeleteBranchResult.description: Result structure for delete branch request.

DeleteDomainAssociationRequest.description: Request structure for the delete Domain Association request.

DeleteJobRequest.description: Request structure for delete job request.

DeleteJobResult.description: Result structure for the delete job request.

DeleteWebhookRequest.description: Request structure for the delete webhook request.

DeleteWebhookResult.description: Result structure for the delete webhook request.

DomainAssociation.description: Structure for Domain Association, which associates a custom domain with an Amplify App.

GetAppRequest.description: Request structure for get App request.

GetBranchRequest.description: Result structure for get branch request.

GetDomainAssociationRequest.description: Request structure for the get Domain Association request.

GetDomainAssociationResult.description: Result structure for the get Domain Association request.

GetJobRequest.description: Request structure for get job request.

GetWebhookRequest.description: Request structure for the get webhook request.

GetWebhookResult.description: Result structure for the get webhook request.

Job.description: Structure for an execution job for an Amplify App.

JobSummary.description: Structure for the summary of a Job.

ListAppsRequest.description: Request structure for an Amplify App list request.

ListAppsResult.description: Result structure for an Amplify App list request.

ListBranchesRequest.description: Request structure for list branches request.

ListBranchesResult.description: Result structure for list branches request.

ListDomainAssociationsRequest.description: Request structure for the list Domain Associations request.

ListDomainAssociationsResult.description: Result structure for the list Domain Association request.

ListJobsRequest.description: Request structure for list job request.

ListJobsResult.description: Maximum number of records to list in a single response.

ListTagsForResourceRequest.description: Request structure used to list tags for resource.

ListWebhooksRequest.description: Request structure for the list webhooks request.

ListWebhooksResult.description: Result structure for the list webhooks request.

StartDeploymentRequest.description: Request structure for start a deployment.

StartDeploymentResult.description: Result structure for start a deployment.

StartJobRequest.description: Request structure for Start job request.

StartJobResult.description: Result structure for run job request.

Step.description: Structure for an execution step for an execution job, for an Amplify App.

StopJobRequest.description: Request structure for stop job request.

StopJobResult.description: Result structure for the stop job request.

TTL.description: The content TTL for the website in seconds.

TagResourceRequest.description: Request structure used to tag resource.

UntagResourceRequest.description: Request structure used to untag resource.

UpdateAppRequest.description: Request structure for update App request.

UpdateAppResult.description: Result structure for an Amplify App update request.

UpdateBranchRequest.description: Request structure for update branch request.

UpdateBranchResult.description: Result structure for update branch request.

UpdateDomainAssociationRequest.description: Request structure for update Domain Association request.

UpdateDomainAssociationResult.description: Result structure for the update Domain Association request.

UpdateWebhookRequest.description: Request structure for update webhook request.

UpdateWebhookResult.description: Result structure for the update webhook request.

Webhook.description: Structure for webhook, which associates a webhook with an Amplify App.
